String.string: Return to Velika and meet {@creature:63#1102$$Seir} in the Velika Consul Office.
Report to Decurion {@creature:247#2001$$Verge} at Pathfinder Post. [Go to Flight Manager {@linkcreature:63#1009#Adela} or use a Pathfinder Post Teleport Scroll.]
Report to {@creature:247#2002$$Yasring} at {@Rgn:47006$$Field Base Lunacy}. [Use the {@LinkCreature:77#1008#Teleportal} to go to Field Base Lunacy.]
Collect {@RawItem:45271$$contaminated mushrooms} for Yasring's cleansing orbs.
Hunt {@LinkCreature:47#2001#argonomorph caprin imps} and get ingredients for {@creature:247#2002$$Yasring}'s cleansing orbs.
Use the orbs at {@Rgn:47003$$Bridgehead} to prevent the spread of contamination.
Use the purifying orb to cleanse the corpses floating in the lake.
Tell {@creature:247#2003$$Cheniel} at {@Rgn:47003$$Bridgehead} you purified the lake.
Ask {@creature:247#2004$$Shemi} at {@Rgn:47003$$Bridgehead} to show you the trees.
Restore the tree with the Purifying Orb.
Tell {@creature:247#2003$$Cheniel} that you restored the trees.
